name: An Aggressive Defense
tooltip:
An Aggressive Defense

Kill 1 Den Watcher, 2 Ursas, 10 Totemics, and 12 Warriors of the Foulweald tribe, and then return to Raene Wolfrunner in Astranaar.

Requirements:
- Foulweald Den Watcher
- Foulweald Ursa x 2
- Foulweald Totemic x 10
- Foulweald Warrior x 12
